inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getEventSource.

namePrefix.description: Specifying this limits the results to only those partner event sources with names that start with the specified prefix

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getEventSource.

arn.description: ARN of the partner event source

createdBy.description: Name of the SaaS partner that created the event source

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

state.description: State of the event source (`ACTIVE` or `PENDING`)
